enumerate:
\begin{enumerate}

\item Lowest weight discrete series:
\begin{equation}
%
{\cal D}^+_j = \{ \mbox{$| j,m \rangle$}: m=j, j+1, j+2, \cdots \},
%
\end{equation}
where $j>0$ such that $J^{-}_{0} \mbox{$| j,j \rangle$} =0$.

\item Highest weight discrete series:
\begin{equation}
%
{\cal D}^-_j = \{ \mbox{$| j,m \rangle$}: m=-j, -j-1, -j-2, \cdots \},
%
\end{equation}
where $j>0$ such that $J^{+}_{0} \mbox{$| j,-j \rangle$} =0$.

\item Principal continuous series:
\begin{equation}
%
{\cal C}^\alpha_j = \{ \mbox{$| j,\alpha,m \rangle$}: m=\alpha, \alpha \pm 1, \alpha \pm 2, \cdots \},
%
\end{equation}
where $0 \leq \alpha <1$ and $j=1/2+is$, $s>0$.

\item Complementary (Supplementary) series:
\begin{equation}
%
{\cal E}^\alpha_j = \{ \mbox{$| j,\alpha,m \rangle$}: m=\alpha, \alpha \pm 1, \alpha \pm 2, \cdots \},
%
\end{equation}
where $0 \leq \alpha <1$, $1/2<j<1$ and $j-1/2<|\alpha-1/2|$.

\item Identity representation: trivial representation with $j=0$.

\
